examples.example: 早餐我吃了美味的包子，感觉一整天都充满了能量。

translate.english: I ate delicious steamed stuffed buns for breakfast and felt full of energy for the whole day.

examples.example: 妈妈包的包子味道鲜美无比，每次都让我吃得非常开心。

translate.english: The steamed buns made by mother taste extremely delicious and every time they make me eat very happily.

examples.example: 我和朋友一起品尝了各种口味的包子，真是美味极了！

translate.english: I tasted various flavors of steamed stuffed buns together with my friends, it was really extremely delicious!
